Verification through reverse image searc: The expert used a reverse image search to identify the origin of the pictures shared in the claim. This helped in determining that some of the photos were actually from a previous farmer rally in 2018.
Comparison with previous news reports: The expert compared the details and context of the pictures with previous news reports. By referencing an article published in The Hindu in 2018, it was found that the images were related to a farmer protest at the UP-Delhi border during the Kisan Kranti Padyatra.
Examination of social media posts: The expert analyzed the social media posts made by various individuals and organizations, including the Indian Youth Congress, Congress leader Imran Pratapgarhi, journalist Prashant Kanojia, and others. This helped in identifying the sources of the pictures and their claims.
Corroboration of information: The expert cross-referenced the information provided in the claim with other reliable sources, such as Alt News. Alt News confirmed that at least three of the photographs being shared were from the 2018 farmer rally, further verifying the inauthenticity of the claim.
